Op Maddale sentencing: Christchurch man Charlie Tereora travelled NZ for meth syndicate https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/op-maddale-sentencing-christchurch-man-charlie-tereora-travelled-nz-for-meth-syndicate/XYZPZR7VOBE6TAO2JC7WZ2TEUM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/op-maddale-sentencing-christchurch-man-charlie-tereora-travelled-nz-for-meth-syndicate/XYZPZR7VOBE6TAO2JC7WZ2TEUM/ Craig KapitanThe church-going defendant “holds himself up as an example of what can go wrong”. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 06:00:00 +0000 Police initially arrested 10 people and seized over a million dollars in cash and assets in August 2019 at the conclusion of Operation Maddale, which targeted the supply and distribution of methamphetamine. Twenty-one people were eventually charged.
